job.title: Marketing Analyst
job.description: pThis role will support the execution and growth of Vrooms productfeed based acquisition channels orchestrating a mix of proprietary and third party toolsnbsp This role is integral to the team and the company as many of Vrooms largest partnerships depend on productfeeds and thirdparty site merchandising This position will work across a spectrum of external partners and internal stakeholders including product data brand marketing digital marketing and supplyppbrppResponsibilitiespulliEnsure high visibility for Vrooms inventory across a broad spectrum of acquisition channels via management over a suite of datafeed oriented toolsliliCreate deploy and measure feedbased optimization testsliliMonitor dashboards tracking product feed healthliliProject manage copy and creative implementation through the spectrum of external partnersliliSupport partnership development onboarding and adhoc marketing analysis through research data collection and data validationliliCreate manage and deploy website UTM tracking codes and phone numbers across the marketing organizationliulpbrppRequirementspulliDemonstrated strength in deductive reasoning logic numbers and problemsolving skillsliliHighly sophisticated communication skills oral and writtenliliPositive attitude and presentable demeanor with an ability to work collaboratively in a rapidly changing environmentliliStrong team playerliliHigh attention to detailliliStrong work ethic drive and staminaliliAbility to work independently with intense and consistent focusliliStrong organization and time management skillsliulpp
